definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: = [[תִּגְלַת פְּלֶאסֶר]] (q.v.) (As. Pulu; Babylonian name of TP, Schr:SBAk 1887, 592; KB ii, 287, cf. 277 Tiele:Gesch 266 f.; cf. (through Pers. trad., EMey:Entstehung, 30) Pw=rov, Canon of Ptol. KAT:2, 490); 2Ki 15:19, 2Ki 15:19, 1Ch 5:26, Foua[l].—Is 66:19, v. [[פוט]].
